mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select uod.*, p.product_name from user_order_detail uod, product_detail pd, product p, user_order uo where uod.product_detail_no=pd.product_detail_no and pd.product_no=p.product_no and uo.order_no=uod.order_no and uod.order_no = #{orderNo} order by order_detail_no desc)a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
